title: Download client over a year out of date?
body: Kind of a suggestion more than anything(please move to correct forum if I have put in wrong one(sorry if I have lol)). The client to download is majorly out of date(15/9/2014?). Any chance this can be updated at a regular basis so it will save some people having to go through gigs of updates just to get back up to current patch date. I'm kind of lucky and have the luxury of unlimited internet usage per month but many others aren't as fortunate. So in a way it will keep them happy as well.
